Calculate net force on the second particle in N: F_net = qBv(1 - 1/sqrt(2)).

Time spent by second particle in N: t = L*sqrt(2)/v.
Calculate deviation using d = 1/2 * a * t^2, resulting in d = qBL^2(1 - 1/sqrt(2))/(mv).
